author: cnbc.com
title: B. Riley Financial Sets Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2017 Earnings Call for Wednesday, March 7 at 4:30 p.m. ET
text:
LOS ANGELES, March 01, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- B. Riley Financial, Inc. (NASDAQ:RILY), a diversified financial services company, will hold a conference call on Wednesday, March 7 at 4:30 p.m. Eastern time (1:30 p.m. Pacific time) to discuss results for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2017. Financial results will be issued in a press release prior to the call.
B. Riley Financial's Chairman and CEO, Bryant Riley, President, Tom Kelleher, and CFO and COO, Phillip Ahn, will host the conference call followed by a question and answer period.
Please call the conference telephone number 10 minutes prior to the start time and an operator will register your name and organization.
Date: Wednesday, March 7, 2018 Time: 4:30 p.m. Eastern time (1:30 p.m. Pacific time)
Toll-Free: 1-877-451-6152 International: 1-201-389-0879 The conference call will be broadcast simultaneously and available for replay via the investor section of the company's website . A replay of the call will be available after 7:30 p.m. Eastern time on the same day through March 14, 2018.
Replay Dial-In Numbers:
Toll-Free: 1-844-512-2921 International: 1-412-317-6671 Replay Pin: 13677233 About B. Riley Financial
Through its subsidiaries, B. Riley Financial, Inc. provides collaborative financial services and solutions to the capital raising and financial advisory needs of public and private companies and high net worth individuals. The company operates through several wholly-owned subsidiaries, including B. Riley FBR, Inc. , Wunderlich Securities, Inc. , Great American Group, LLC , B. Riley Capital Management, LLC (which includes B. Riley Asset Management , B. Riley Wealth Management , and Great American Capital Partners, LLC ) and B. Riley Principal Investments , a group that makes proprietary investments in other businesses, such as the acquisition of United Online, Inc.
